metadata.title: CVE-2024-9407 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability exists in the bind-propagation option of the Dockerfile RUN--mount instruction. The system does not properly validate the input passedto this option, allowing users to pass arbitrary parameters to the mountinstruction. This issue can be exploited to mount sensitive directoriesfrom the host into a container during the build process and, in some cases,modify the contents of those mounted files. Even if SELinux is used, thisvulnerability can bypass its protection by allowing the source directory tobe relabeled to give the container access to host files.

criterions.comment: golang-github-containers-buildah package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
